amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings stating that the Paris Agreement recognizes that adaptation is a key component of the global response to climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boyle, Brendan F. amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Boyle, Brendan F..
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Boyle, Brendan F..
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boyle, Brendan F. amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
